_aChangeLog.text: fixed lighting (light environment pitch was set to 0 when -90 is standard), should be playable on default monitorgamma now. deleted useless trigger which allowed for massive skip and blocked off some other skips, lit some ladders which were not very obvious to see

_sText:
This is a ported map bhop CS 1.6 - I DID NOT MAKE IT

Short map about 1min long. Updated the archive with a new version that fixes optimization issues (lighting, skips in gameplay, etc) I'll upload more ports like this if people enjoy them (probably will regardless)
